line.comment: * Race logic to prvent Kha'ak and Xenon drops if flight time is less than 30 seconds
* Strip the wares from the target and get a list of them
* Get the parameters for the crate drop
* Check the crate is valid to be dropped
* Work out where to drop the crate

sval.val: Race logic to prvent Kha'ak and Xenon drops if flight time is less than 30 seconds
Strip the wares from the target and get a list of them
Get the parameters for the crate drop
Check the crate is valid to be dropped
Work out where to drop the crate
